sections.general:
APPAREL PRODUCTION MANAGER
Executive Profile
Creative Apparel Production Manager adept at product development design change and cost tracking to adhere to budgetary guidelines. Proficient
in the use of design software to further expedite project completions. Specialize in applying creative approaches to design while managing daily
production staff activities.
